name: Contadina® Mediterranean White Bean Bruschetta
author: Contadina
summary: Slices of baguette are topped with pizza sauce and a chunky bean spread then topped with lemon zest and parsley for quick and tasty party appetizers.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can white beans, rinsed and drained
¼ cup diced roasted red bell peppers
¼ cup chopped pitted black olives
1  baguette, cut into 16 (1/2-inch) slices, lightly toasted
⅔ cup Contadina® Pizza Sauce or Pizza Squeeze, or more as needed
directions: Heat olive oil in a large non-stick skillet
Lightly mash beans with a fork
Place bean mixture in a medium bowl and stir in peppers and olives; set aside
Stir together parsley and lemon zest in a small bowl; set aside
Spread each bread slice with 1 to 2 tsp
Pizza Sauce and top with 1 Tbsp
